DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE APP_MHN ADD [WRITE_OFF_REF] VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT ''
ALTER TABLE APP_QM_SAMPLE ADD [USER_DATA_3] VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT ''
ALTER TABLE APP_QM_SAMPLE ADD [USER_DATA_4] VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT ''

ALTER VIEW [dbo].[VIEW_QM_RESULTS] AS SELECT samp.PROCESS_ORDER as 'PROCESS_ORDER', samp.MATERIAL as 'MATERIAL', samp.SAMPLE_ID as 'SAMPLE_ID', samp.SAMPLE_DATE as 'SAMPLE_DATE', samp.USER_DATA_1 as 'USER_DATA_1', samp.USER_DATA_2 as 'USER_DATA_2', samp.USER_DATA_1 as 'USER_DATA_3', samp.USER_DATA_2 as 'USER_DATA_4', result.TEST_ID as 'TEST_ID', dict.DESCRIPTION as 'TEST_DESCRIPTION', result.VALUE as 'VALUE', COALESCE(valist.DESCRIPTION,result.VALUE) AS 'RESULT' FROM APP_QM_SAMPLE samp LEFT JOIN APP_QM_RESULT result ON (result.SAMPLE_ID = samp.SAMPLE_ID) LEFT JOIN APP_QM_DICTIONARY dict ON (dict.TEST_ID = result.TEST_ID) LEFT JOIN APP_QM_SELECTLIST valist ON (valist.SELECT_LIST_ID = dict.SELECT_LIST_ID AND valist.VALUE = result.VALUE)

INSERT INTO [dbo].[SYS_USER_REPORTS] VALUES ('USER_DATA_1', '0', 'USER_DATA_1 (SAMPLE LABEL)', 'SELECT dbo.[APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA].DATA FROM dbo.[APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA] RIGHT JOIN dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER] ON dbo.[APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA].MATERIAL = dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER].MATERIAL AND dbo.[APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA].[CUSTOMER_ID] = dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER].[CUSTOMER_ID] WHERE dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER].PROCESS_ORDER = ? AND dbo.[APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA].DATA_ID = ''CONTAINER_CODE''', '', 'SYSTEM', 'Y', 'N', '', '', 'N', '', 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', '');

CREATE VIEW VIEW_QM_ANALYSIS_01 AS SELECT dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE].[BATCH_SUFFIX], APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION AS RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION, dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[SAMPLE_DATE], dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[SAMPLE_ID], dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[PROCESS_ORDER], dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER].[REQUIRED_RESOURCE], dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].MATERIAL, dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[USER_ID] LABEL_PRINTED_BY, dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[USER_DATA_1] AS USER_DATA_1, dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[USER_DATA_2] AS USER_DATA_2, dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[USER_DATA_3] AS USER_DATA_3, dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[USER_DATA_4] AS USER_DATA_4, [APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PACK_PANEL].DESCRIPTION AS [PACK_PANEL], [APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PROD_PANEL].DESCRIPTION AS [PRODUCT_PANEL], [APP_QM_RESULT_PH].[VALUE] AS PH FROM dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE] JOIN dbo.[APP_QM_RESULT] AS [APP_QM_RESULT_PACK_PANEL] ON dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[SAMPLE_ID] = [APP_QM_RESULT_PACK_PANEL].[SAMPLE_ID] JOIN dbo.[APP_QM_RESULT] AS [APP_QM_RESULT_PROD_PANEL] ON dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[SAMPLE_ID] = [APP_QM_RESULT_PROD_PANEL].[SAMPLE_ID] JOIN dbo.[APP_QM_RESULT] AS [APP_QM_RESULT_PH] ON dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[SAMPLE_ID] = [APP_QM_RESULT_PH].[SAMPLE_ID] JOIN dbo.[APP_QM_DICTIONARY] AS [APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PACK_PANEL] ON [APP_QM_RESULT_PACK_PANEL].[TEST_ID] = [APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PACK_PANEL].[TEST_ID] JOIN dbo.[APP_QM_SELECTLIST] AS [APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PACK_PANEL] ON [APP_QM_RESULT_PACK_PANEL].[VALUE] = [APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PACK_PANEL].[VALUE] AND [APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PACK_PANEL].[SELECT_LIST_ID] = [APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PACK_PANEL].[SELECT_LIST_ID] JOIN dbo.[APP_QM_DICTIONARY] AS [APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PROD_PANEL] ON [APP_QM_RESULT_PROD_PANEL].[TEST_ID] = [APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PROD_PANEL].[TEST_ID] JOIN dbo.[APP_QM_SELECTLIST] AS [APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PROD_PANEL] ON [APP_QM_RESULT_PROD_PANEL].[VALUE] = [APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PROD_PANEL].[VALUE] AND [APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PROD_PANEL].[SELECT_LIST_ID] = [APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PROD_PANEL].[SELECT_LIST_ID] JOIN dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER] ON dbo.[APP_QM_SAMPLE].[PROCESS_ORDER] = dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER].[PROCESS_ORDER] JOIN dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE] ON dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER].[REQUIRED_RESOURCE] = dbo.[APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE].[REQUIRED_RESOURCE] WHERE APP_QM_RESULT_PROD_PANEL.TEST_ID = 'PANEL' AND APP_QM_RESULT_PACK_PANEL.TEST_ID = 'PACKAGING VERIFICATION' AND APP_QM_RESULT_PH.TEST_ID = 'PANEL PH'

INSERT INTO SYS_MODULES ( MODULE_ID, RF_ACTIVE, DK_ACTIVE, MODULE_TYPE, HINT, MNEMONIC, ICON_FILENAME, HELPSET_ID, REPORT_FILENAME, EXEC_FILENAME, EXEC_DIR, PRINT_PREVIEW, PRINT_DIALOG, PRINT_COPIES, REPORT_TYPE, RESOURCE_KEY, AUTO_LABELLER_COMMAND_FILE, AUTO_LABELLER_LABEL_FILE) VALUES ( 'RPT_QM_ANALYSIS_01', 'N', 'Y', 'REPORT', null, '0', null, null, 'QM_Analysis_01.jrxml', null, null, 'Y', 'Y', '1', 'Standard', 'mod_RPT_QM_ANALYSIS_01', null, null)

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[APP_QM_ANALYSIS] ( [ANALYSIS_ID] nvarchar(25) NOT NULL, [DESCRIPTION] nvarchar(80) NULL, [DISPLAY_SEQUENCE] int NULL, [MODULE_ID] nvarchar(35) NULL, [PROCESS_ORDER_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [PROCESS_ORDER_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_PROCESS_ORDER'), [MATERIAL_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [MATERIAL_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_MATERIAL'), [SAMPLE_DATE_START_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [SAMPLE_DATE_START_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_SAMPLE_DATE_START'), [SAMPLE_DATE_END_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [SAMPLE_DATE_END_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_SAMPLE_DATE_END'), [USER_DATA_1_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [USER_DATA_1_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_USER_DATA_1'), [USER_DATA_2_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [USER_DATA_2_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_USER_DATA_2'), [USER_DATA_3_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [USER_DATA_3_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_USER_DATA_3'), [USER_DATA_4_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [USER_DATA_4_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_USER_DATA_4'), [BATCH_SUFFIX_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [BATCH_SUFFIX_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_BATCH_SUFFIX'), [RESOURCE_REQD] nvarchar(1) NULL DEFAULT (N'N'), [RESOURCE_PARAM] nvarchar(45) NULL DEFAULT (N'P_RESOURCE') ) ON [PRIMARY]

ALTER TABLE [dbo].[APP_QM_ANALYSIS] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_APP_QM_ANALYSIS] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([ANALYSIS_ID]) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [default]

INSERT INTO APP_QM_ANALYSIS VALUES ('AN_01','Analysis of Panel Results',1,'RPT_QM_ANALYSIS_01','N','P_PROCESS_ORDER','N','P_MATERIAL','Y','P_SAMPLE_DATE_START','Y','P_SAMPLE_DATE_END','N','P_USER_DATA_1','N','P_USER_DATA_2','N','P_USER_DATA_3','N','P_USER_DATA_4','Y','P_BATCH_SUFFIX','N','P_RESOURCE')
